subject: Output from tests
msgSnippet: Hi, I am wondering if there is a standard way to have a report of what testsuites/test methods JUnit has run and the test results. I had a quick look at the
messageBody:
Hi,

I am wondering if there is a 'standard' way to have a report of what
testsuites/test methods JUnit has run and the test results.
I had a quick look at the Junitreport Ant task but ideally don't want
to run the tests from Ant, and anyway, its not obvious to me how to
proceed with this approach.
Others speak of Maven but that may be overkill...

cheers
Andy
